snippet: The dance critic Alastair Macaulay assesses the Statue of Liberty’s form and line from various angles and distances, including from his bedroom window.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay assesses the aesthetic and symbolic charm of the Statue of Liberty, as seen from various vantage points, including his bedroom window.
lead_paragraph: The dance critic Alastair Macaulay assesses the Statue of Liberty’s form and line from various angles and distances, including from his bedroom window.

headline.print_headline: Admiring Lady Liberty at Arm’s Length
headline.seo: Statue of Liberty, Viewed From Afar With Affection
headline.main: Statue of Liberty, Viewed From Afar With Affection
